body_html: Unfortunately the current approach to HVX acceleration requires new op implementations to be written for the DSP before they can be used. Looking at the list of ops, a lot of them seem like they might be related to batch normalization. Are you able to run the fold_constants transform using the graph transform tool and see if some of them disappear?
body_text: Unfortunately the current approach to HVX acceleration requires new op implementations to be written for the DSP before they can be used. Looking at the list of ops, a lot of them seem like they might be related to batch normalization. Are you able to run the fold_constants transform using the graph transform tool and see if some of them disappear?
body: Unfortunately the current approach to HVX acceleration requires new op implementations to be written for the DSP before they can be used. Looking at the list of ops, a lot of them seem like they might be related to batch normalization. Are you able to run the `fold_constants` transform using the graph transform tool and see if some of them disappear?
